1.title: Guts and Glory
1.plot: In a nation forged by guts and glory, it takes true cojones to stand out from the crowd. Legendary figures Benjamin Franklin, Al Capone, Abraham Lincoln and Ernest Hemingway have earned their seat at the tough guy table for their no-nonsense attitudes.

2.title: Living on the Edge
2.plot: Neil Armstrong, Teddy Roosevelt, John Dillinger and Harry Houdini all lived life on the edge and they all have one thing in common-they're badass Americans.

3.title: Risk-Takers and Renegades
3.plot: It's a five-round battle to name the most Badass of them all. In one corner, Evel Knievel, the original daredevil with the record for most broken bones takes on the People's President, Andrew Jackson, the Billionaire Howard Hughes and General Patton.

4.title: Players and Playboys
4.plot: The vast American landscape breeds badasses of every stripe. Elvis Presley. Ulysses S. Grant. Ted Williams. John F. Kennedy. From military mavericks to pop culture royalty these four iconic figures carve their own paths and push their bodies to the limit

5.title: Fight or Flight
5.plot: John Glenn, Bruce Lee, Harry Truman and Hunter S. Thompson all lived life without boundaries and they all have one thing in common-they're badass Americans.

6.title: Rebels with a Cause
6.plot: It's the final 5-round Battle of the season to name who's the most Badass. In one corner, George Washington, our first President takes on notorious General Douglas MacArthur. And Amelia Earhart takes on boxing legend Jack Johnson.

imdb.plot outline: America's Most Badass details the exciting untold badass side of American icons. This season will feature the stories of Benjamin Franklin, Harry Houdini, Neil Armstrong, and other legendary figures - all in an effort to show how truly badass they were.
imdb.title: America's Most Badass
plot: _America's Most Badass_ (qv) details the exciting untold badass side of American icons. This season will feature the stories of Benjamin Franklin, Harry Houdini, Neil Armstrong, and other legendary figures - all in an effort to show how truly badass they were.
